# DevOps Cheat Sheet

A multilingual DevOps cheat sheet — Linux, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and beyond — practical tips and scenarios created by a hands-on engineer for engineers like you.

::: {.hero-bullets}
- Only verified commands and scenarios provided as is.
- Unified templates + localization in 27 languages.
- Fast search, clean examples, minimal fluff.
:::
